ygData.subject: OOC: My silence
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello, Sorry about my silence but I have family medical issues that have suddenly arrived and may not be gone for quite some time. This may require me to leave

Hello,
     Sorry about my silence but I have family medical issues that have
suddenly arrived and may not be gone for quite some time. This may
require me to leave the game or at the very least scale back on what I
am playing. I will do my best to finish up the story arcs I am in (The
new guy appearing at the Ark, The Minions, Ect) but I will have to play
it by ear to see how active I will remain, and it may not be till later
in the week until I can respond.

My apologies

Preston
